description:
Located in Rolla, Missouri, Daniels Law Office is an established and trusted law firm. We have a proven track record in the legal areas of criminal defense, family law, personal injury, bankruptcy and estate planning. We help everyday individuals facing legal challenges and are committed to providing high-quality legal representation.

Our law firm is led by Stephen Daniels, a lawyer with more than 20 years of legal experience. He has vast experience in many different legal areas and understands how stressful legal issues can affect you and your family. Mr. Daniels is respected and well-known throughout the community for his level of professionalism, integrity and dedication to clients. When you meet with him, he will take time to listen to your goals for your situation and make certain that your rights are protected.

We offer a wide range of legal services in several practice areas, including:

Criminal defense: drug crimes, DWI, white collar crimes, burglary, assault and theft defense
Family law: divorce, complex divorce, child custody, modifications and more
Bankruptcy: Chapter 7 matters, including foreclosure defense and garnishments
Personal injury: car accidents, motorcycle accidents, commercial vehicle accidents, truck accidents and more
Estate planning: wills, trusts and guardianships

At our law firm, we understand that legal issues can place a number of pressures on an individual. Regardless of how straightforward or complex your situation may seem, we will advocate for your best interests. If you value honest and straightforward legal advice, choose Daniels Law Office.
